content:
two ideas for design:
1. Vishwesh Jainkuniya in play store screenshots posted a number of images. It would be nice to group them in rows next to each other (gmail does it) as you otherwise end up with lots of white space.
pasted image
2. to show images inline rather than at the end of the msg as in this case. Quite often I write mini-instructions with a gif or image in the middle which shows up at the end.
my edited screenshot doesn't follow any underlying grid for the images and for the times one could do a from xx:xx - xx:xx for a row of images.
